title: Mobile (hand held) Small Format Printer
content:
Check this gadget out! A hand-held printer...

[http://www.printdreams.co.uk/printbrush.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131132955/http:/www.printdreams.co.uk/printbrush.php "http://www.printdreams.co.uk/printbrush.php")

author: evanbrog

comments.content: Also it looks like it was developed several years ago, slated to release in 2005...now it's looking like 2010.
